boardgame.name: Gloomhaven
boardgame.description: Gloomhaven is a game of Euro-inspired tactical combat in a persistent world of shifting motives. Players will take on the role of a wandering adventurer with their own special set of skills and their own reasons for traveling to this dark corner of the world. Players must work together out of necessity to clear out menacing dungeons and forgotten ruins. In the process, they will enhance their abilities with experience and loot, discover new locations to explore and plunder, and expand an ever-branching story fueled by the decisions they make._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is a game with a persistent and changing world that is ideally played over many game sessions. After a scenario, players will make decisions on what to do, which will determine how the story continues, kind of like a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Choose Your Own Adventure_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; book. Playing through a scenario is a cooperative affair where players will fight against automated monsters using an innovative card system to determine the order of play and what a player does on their turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn, a player chooses two cards to play out of their hand. The number on the top card determines their initiative for the round. Each card also has a top and bottom power, and when it is a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s turn in the initiative order, they determine whether to use the top power of one card and the bottom power of the other, or vice-versa. Players must be careful, though, because over time they will permanently lose cards from their hands. If they take too long to clear a dungeon, they may end up exhausted and be forced to retreat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Back on September 30, 2015, Gloomhaven kickstarter ended, and I had backed the game at the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;with minis_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; level. It looked interesting, but over the course of the next 16 months, I realized the game really didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t interest me. On top of that, I have several friends that bought it, so I will probably have a chance to play it at some time. It arrived February 4th 2017, and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s massive. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d heard some people had issues with shipping, but mine arrived intact and with no issues. The game is well packed in a snug box with foam padding, and then this box will be packed in a larger box with padding. I will use the boxes that were used when it was originally shipped to me, but will pad the larger box better than Amazon did - and I will tape the outside box better as well. Shipping charges listed below are for USPS Priority. For Zones 6, 7 and 8 FedEx will likely be less. The listed prices include $250.00 insurance. Standees version. 3 scenarios played with 2 players - only 2 characters used. Everything is in excellent condition (cards were sleeved before play). Punched components are sorted and bagged. 2 to hit decks, monster hit deck, monster AI cards, initial road and city encounter cards, battle goal cards, and base character level one skill cards are sleeved. I will include remainder of sleeve packs for buyer to sleeve additional cards, as needed. I will also include upper deck card card pages (pack of 10) for displaying shop items. The legacy components of the game have been reset, where possible, to new out of box. The only things not able to be reset follow: board has several location stickers on it and 2 prosperity boxes (not levels - 2 out of 4 steps from levels 1 to 2) checked off, and scenario book has 3 scenario checkboxes and 3 loot checkboxes checked off. These would be the results of most initial 3 plays of the game, and so has very little impact on new plays outside of very, very minor early spoilers (map location stickers on board). A party wanting to start from scratch just needs to not check off their first two prosperity gains, and needs to look at the prerequisite first section of each scenario so that they know which of the handful of sticker locations on the board they can go to. Checked off boxes in the scenario book have no impact except to indicate they have been completed by a group - this is easy to ignore for new groups. This is a very large box. If you have any questions, feel free to write me a PM. :-) Zum Verkauf steht das englische Brettspiel Gloomhaven inklusive Miniaturen. Gloomhaven ist ein taktisches Kampfspiel im Euro-Stil und spielt in einer hartnäckigen und sich schnell verändernden Welt. Dabei schlüpfen die Spieler in die Rolle eines Weltraumabenteurers mit jeweils speziellen Waffen und Kampftechniken. Im Verlauf des Spiels können die Spieler ihre Charakterfähigkeiten und Waffen durch Erfahrungspunkte und Belohnungen verbessern. Es gibt zwei Möglichkeiten, Gloomhaven zu spielen. Einmal den Kampagnen-Modus, und den zwanglosen Modus. Diese Version beinhaltet alle erreichten Stretchgoals aus der Kickstarter Kampagne, darunter 18 Miniaturen für die verschiedenen Charakterklassen! Lediglich die kleine Kickstarter Danksagungsanmerkung ist nicht enthalten! Das Spiel ist neu, originalverpackt und bereits in meinen Händen. Kann also sofort versendet werden! Bei Fragen einfach eMail an mich senden! Weitere Bilder können auf Anfrage per Mail versendet werden! Überweisung, PayPal und Barbezahlung bei Abholung möglich! Versandkosten trägt der Käufer. Versand erfolgt umgehend nach Zahlungseingang. Für den europäischen Versand bitte anfragen, das Spiel ist knapp 10kg schwer!

I purchased Gloomhaven for solo play, played 10 or so scenarios, and just decided it wasn’t for me. The price is so low because I have placed some stickers on the map, made several markings on the map, and hand modified (very small modifications, changing a 15 to 12 for example) several of the cards to bring them into alignment with the second edition. I HAVE NOT destroyed any of the cards, or stickered any cards with enchantments. All content is accounted for and well-cared for. I am happy to include the custom storage solution I devised with a nice Plano box. I know this isn’t for everyone, but it you would like to get into Gloomhaven at a low price I am happy to provide. There are very nice web tools that manage the map portion of the game that could be used in place of mine, or the stickers could be taken off and the reusable sticker pack purchased and used. Please let me know if you’d like any more info or pictures. I live in the Boston area, so local would be best due to the HUGE box. If there is interest I am happy to discuss shipping options as well. Thanks!
